content:
To support long-running calls, Apex Continuations are provided. If an OmniScript calls a long-running Integration Procedure or Apex class, enable continuation. For FlexCards calling a long-running Integration Procedure with an HTTP action or Remote Action, add an Options Map to the Integration Procedure data source and set useContinuation to true.

For OmniScripts calling long-running Integration Procedures, check the Use Continuation setting in the Integration Procedure Action. To make a long-running remote call using Apex classes:

Make a Long-Running Remote Call Using VlocityContinuationIntegration (deprecated)

Make a Long-Running Remote Call Using OmniStudio.OmniContinuation (recommended)

For VlocityOpenInterface2 interface and VlocityContinuationIntegration class, use the Salesforce Continuation object to support normal Remote Calls and Remote Calls that use the Continuation Object.
title: Enabling Long-Running Calls in OmniStudio
